Text: Green power price curveSorry Dick I did not manage to get back to you today Lets talk about this Monday Due to the limitation of the current database front end design we will need to squeeze the green power curve into one of the existing uplift component We can break it out but probably not on the first release Thanks Ress

RE FW Transmission curtailments PGE Proposal Cc This is really a grid reliability program directed by the CA ISO under stage emengency it is therefore not dependent on whether the customer is receiving energy product from PGE the utility or other ESPs since everyone is a user of the grid for transmission services My understanding is that the only way to avoid curtailments is to get certified by CPUC as essential enduser I think recently the BART train system successfully lobbied the CPUC to certify it as essential Of course it will be a tough sell to do the same for a private enterprise Realistically the only way to cover such noneconcomic driven interruption is to put in on site back up generation Ress
